And note, his eyes aren't always amber...in one flashback scene his
eyes are blue...or did S.H. go through the trouble of wearing contacs?
 So it doesn't matter if his eyecolor is off.

Stupid tight black T-shirt has been obscuring our view the entire
time!!!...note bandages around the lower chest...just like Sano...at
this point in the story KEnshin already met Sano right? ... if this is
S.H. and I THINK SO then Saitou would have already seen Sano with
Kenshin...Saitou with a green wig AND sporting Sano-like bandages 0_0
